mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_MALL_DISPATCH_GOOD t where t.ORDERGOODID = #{orderGoodId}
SELECT * FROM TB_MALL_DISPATCH_GOOD t where t.ORDERID = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MALL_DISPATCH_GOOD ( ORDERGOODID, ORDERID, GOODID, GOODCODE, GOODNAME, BARNO, UNIT, RANK, FZCOLOR, FZSIZE, MODEL, TYPEID, TYPENAME, BRANDID, BRANDNAME, NUMS, SENDNUMS, PURCHASENUMS, PURCHASEPRICE, PAYPRICE, AMT, PAYABLEAMT, PAYAMT, UNPAYAMT, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, DISPATCHNUMS, RECEIVENUMS, STOCKTYPE, STOCKTYPENAME ) VALUES( #{info.orderGoodId:VARCHAR}, #{info.orderId:VARCHAR}, #{info.goodId:VARCHAR}, #{info.goodCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.goodName:VARCHAR}, #{info.barNo:VARCHAR}, #{info.unit:VARCHAR}, #{info.rank:VARCHAR}, #{info.fzColor:VARCHAR}, #{info.fzSize:VARCHAR}, #{info.model:VARCHAR}, #{info.typeId:VARCHAR}, #{info.typeName:VARCHAR}, #{info.brandId:VARCHAR}, #{info.brandName:VARCHAR}, #{info.nums:NUMERIC}, #{info.sendNums:NUMERIC}, #{info.purchaseNums:NUMERIC}, #{info.purchasePrice:VARCHAR}, #{info.payPrice:VARCHAR}, #{info.amt:VARCHAR}, #{info.payableAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.payAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.unpayAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.createtime:VARCHAR}, #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR}, #{info.dispatchNums:NUMERIC}, #{info.receiveNums:NUMERIC}, #{info.stockType:NUMERIC}, #{info.stockTypeName:VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO TB_MALL_DISPATCH_GOOD ( ORDERGOODID, ORDERID, GOODID, GOODCODE, GOODNAME, BARNO, UNIT, RANK, FZCOLOR, FZSIZE, MODEL, TYPEID, TYPENAME, BRANDID, BRANDNAME, NUMS, SENDNUMS, PURCHASENUMS, PURCHASEPRICE, PAYPRICE, AMT, PAYABLEAMT, PAYAMT, UNPAYAMT, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, DISPATCHNUMS, RECEIVENUMS, STOCKTYPE, STOCKTYPENAME ) VALUES
( #{info.orderGoodId:VARCHAR}, #{info.orderId:VARCHAR}, #{info.goodId:VARCHAR}, #{info.goodCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.goodName:VARCHAR}, #{info.barNo:VARCHAR}, #{info.unit:VARCHAR}, #{info.rank:VARCHAR}, #{info.fzColor:VARCHAR}, #{info.fzSize:VARCHAR}, #{info.model:VARCHAR}, #{info.typeId:VARCHAR}, #{info.typeName:VARCHAR}, #{info.brandId:VARCHAR}, #{info.brandName:VARCHAR}, #{info.nums:NUMERIC}, #{info.sendNums:NUMERIC}, #{info.purchaseNums:NUMERIC}, #{info.purchasePrice:VARCHAR}, #{info.payPrice:VARCHAR}, #{info.amt:VARCHAR}, #{info.payableAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.payAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.unpayAmt:VARCHAR}, #{info.createtime:VARCHAR}, #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR}, #{info.dispatchNums:NUMERIC}, #{info.receiveNums:NUMERIC}, #{info.stockType:NUMERIC}, #{info.stockTypeName:VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MALL_DISPATCH_GOOD SET ORDERID = #{info.orderId:VARCHAR}, GOODID = #{info.goodId:VARCHAR}, GOODCODE = #{info.goodCode:VARCHAR}, GOODNAME = #{info.goodName:VARCHAR}, BARNO = #{info.barNo:VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{info.unit:VARCHAR}, RANK = #{info.rank:VARCHAR}, FZCOLOR = #{info.fzColor:VARCHAR}, FZSIZE = #{info.fzSize:VARCHAR}, MODEL = #{info.model:VARCHAR}, TYPEID = #{info.typeId:VARCHAR}, TYPENAME = #{info.typeName:VARCHAR}, BRANDID = #{info.brandId:VARCHAR}, BRANDNAME = #{info.brandName:VARCHAR}, NUMS = #{info.nums:NUMERIC}, SENDNUMS = #{info.sendNums:NUMERIC}, PURCHASENUMS = #{info.purchaseNums:NUMERIC}, PURCHASEPRICE = #{info.purchasePrice:VARCHAR}, PAYPRICE = #{info.payPrice:VARCHAR}, AMT = #{info.amt:VARCHAR}, PAYABLEAMT = #{info.payableAmt:VARCHAR}, PAYAMT = #{info.payAmt:VARCHAR}, UNPAYAMT = #{info.unpayAmt:VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR}, DISPATCHNUMS = #{info.dispatchNums:NUMERIC}, RECEIVENUMS = #{info.receiveNums:NUMERIC}, STOCKTYPE = #{info.stockType:NUMERIC}, STOCKTYPENAME = #{info.stockTypeName:VARCHAR} WHERE ORDERGOODID = #{info.orderGoodId}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM TB_MALL_DISPATCH_GOOD WHERE ORDERGOODID in
#{ids}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM TB_MALL_DISPATCH_GOOD t WHERE 1=1
and ( 2=1 or t.ORDERGOODID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.ORDERID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.GOODID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.GOODCODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.GOODNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.BARNO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.UNIT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.RANK LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.FZCOLOR LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.FZSIZE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.MODEL LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.TYPEID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.TYPENAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.BRANDID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.BRANDNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.NUMS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.SENDNUMS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.PURCHASENUMS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.PURCHASEPRICE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.PAYPRICE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.AMT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.PAYABLEAMT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.PAYAMT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.UNPAYAMT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.CREATETIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.UPDATETIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.DISPATCHNUMS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.RECEIVENUMS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.STOCKTYPE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.STOCKTYPENAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') )
order by t.UPDATETIME DESC
